Why?

Surely this is just your personal preference, not a bug. Personally I prefer only having to make one click to get to the Posting page.

item.title: Ticket #193 (Generic pings that fail stop any subsequent pings) created
item.dc:creator: MCincubus
item.description:
For example, if you have WP set to ping these URIs: ​http://microsoft.com/ ​http://rpc.pingomatic.com/

in that order, Ping-O-Matic won't get the ping, because the ping to ​http://microsoft.com/ fails.

item.dc:creator: Kitten
item.description: Owner, Resolution changed

item.title: Ticket #192 (Excerpt is summarized when options are set as such.) closed
item.dc:creator: Kitten
item.description: The diff fixes it. Should be rolled in.

item.title: Ticket #192 (Excerpt is summarized when options are set as such.) updated
item.dc:creator: Kitten
item.description: Uploaded wp-rss2.diff as a fix for this, please test and close bug if patch works.

item.title: Ticket #192 (Excerpt is summarized when options are set as such.) created
item.dc:creator: VxJasonxV
item.description:
When a user has their options set to summarize the syndicated content, the excerpt (if given) will be summarized. This should not happen.

An entry should be limited, but in the case an excerpt is entered, the excerpt should be posted in full.

Test: Set your syndication options (Options -> Reading -> Syndication Feeds) to summary, and create a new entry with an excerpt longer than 50 words. View this post with an RSS reader, excerpt has been limited.

item.description: Well if it's saved as a draft it isn't going to be published. To publish to the future you, well, publish to the future, not draft to the future.
